content: When you return from the cave, go back up the Cooling Slope and toward the area where the golden spiked ball flew off the edge of the cliff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cooling Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Baw-Lang-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
When you return from the cave, go back up the Cooling Slope and toward the area where the golden spiked ball flew off the edge of the cliff.
